title: Floating panel removed in v1.6.4
details:
In v1.6.4, the floating Quick Tabs Manager panel was completely removed. The extension now uses sidebar-only Quick Tab management.

Key changes:
- Deleted src/features/quick-tabs/panel.js and entire panel/ directory
- Both Ctrl+Alt+Z and Alt+Shift+Z now open the sidebar Manager tab
- panelManager property removed from QuickTabsManager
- Sidebar Quick Tabs Manager is in sidebar/quick-tabs-manager.js
- Test handlers for floating panel return deprecation notices

Files affected:
- background.js (removed _toggleQuickTabsPanel, both commands open sidebar)
- src/content.js (removed TOGGLE_QUICK_TABS_PANEL handler)
- src/features/quick-tabs/index.js (removed PanelManager import and init)
- manifest.json (updated version and descriptions)
